General.Name: Xiamen Yanjan New Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Yanjan New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of professional disposable hygiene materials in China and internationally. The company offers PE perforated film, 3D aperture non-woven, hot air-through non-woven, ADL surge, spunlace, hot air-through spunbond, melt-blown, and spinform products. Its products are used in the sanitary napkins, pads, adult and baby diapers, dry tissues, wet tissues, and filters. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jiquan  Xie
1.Title: Chairman & Deputy Gen. Mang. & Vice Chairman
